text: Masters of Chant IV is the fifth album by German band Gregorian. ==Track listing== # "The Gift" (Carsten Heusmann, Amelia Brightman) # "Bridge over Troubled Water" (Paul Simon) (original by Simon and Garfunkel) # "With or Without You" (U2) (original by U2) # "Maid of Orleans" (Andy McCluskey) (original by Orchestral Manoeuvres in the Dark) # "Angels" (Guy Chambers, Robbie Williams) (original by Robbie Williams) # "Evening Falls..." (Enya, Nicky Ryan) (original by Enya) # "I'll Find My Way Home" (Jon Anderson, Vangelis) (original by Jon & Vangelis) # "Imagine" (John Lennon) (original by John Lennon) # "For No One" (John Lennon, Paul McCartney) (original by The Beatles) # "Hide and Seek" (Howard Jones) (original by Howard Jones) # "World" (Barry Gibb, Maurice Gibb, Robin Gibb) (original by Bee Gees) # "High Hopes" (David Gilmour, Polly Samson) (original by Pink Floyd) # "Clocks" (Guy Berryman, Jon Buckland, Will Champion, Chris Martin) (original by Coldplay) ===Bonus tracks=== # "The End of Days" (Jan-Eric Kohrs, Amelia Brightman) # "Heaven Is a Place on Earth" (Rick Nowels, Ellen Shipley) (original by Belinda Carlisle) # "Le Temps des Cathedrales" (Luc Plamondon, Riccardo Cocciante) (from the musical Notre Dame de Paris) Category:2003 albums Category:Covers albums Category:Gregorian (band) albums Category:Edel AG albums
title: Masters of Chant Chapter IV
